scripts.package: npm run build && zip -r function.zip dist node_modules
scripts.deploy: npm run package && aws cloudformation deploy --template-file template.yaml --stack-name agentic-profile-mcp --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
scripts.status: aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name agentic-profile-mcp --query 'Stacks[0].StackStatus' --output text 2>/dev/null || echo 'STACK_DELETED'
scripts.test:local: npm run build && sam local invoke AgenticProfileMCPFunction --event events/test-event.json --template sam-template.yaml
scripts.test:tools-list: npm run build && sam local invoke AgenticProfileMCPFunction --event events/test-tools-list.json --template sam-template.yaml
scripts.test:get-profile: npm run build && sam local invoke AgenticProfileMCPFunction --event events/test-get-profile.json --template sam-template.yaml
scripts.test:all: npm run test:local && npm run test:tools-list && npm run test:get-profile
